Back import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Chat } from '../models/chat'; import { WorkshopService } from '../workshop.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat', templateUrl: './chat.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat.component.css'] }) export class ChatComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private workshopService: WorkshopService) { } @Input() fromOrganizer : boolean = false; @Input() usernameTo: string; @Input() usernameFrom: string; @Input() workshopId: string; messageToSend: string | null = ""; chat: Chat; ngOnInit(): void { if(!this.fromOrganizer){ this.usernameTo = sessionStorage.getItem('usernameTo'); this.usernameFrom = sessionStorage.getItem('usernameFrom'); this.workshopId = sessionStorage.getItem('workshopId'); } this.workshopService.getChat(this.usernameFrom, this.workshopId).subscribe((resp)=>{ this.chat = resp as Chat; }) } sendMessage(){ if(this.messageToSend != ""){ let username1Send = this.chat.username1; let username2Send = this.chat.username2; if(this.fromOrganizer){ username1Send = this.chat.username2; username2Send = this.chat.username1; } this.workshopService.postMessageToChat(username1Send, username2Send,this.messageToSend,this.chat.workshopId).subscribe((resp)=>{ this.workshopService.getChat(this.usernameFrom, this.workshopId).subscribe((resp)=>{ this.chat = resp as Chat; this.messageToSend = "" }) }) } else{ this.messageToSend = "" } } }
